Posts.EditableText: The game was running perfectly and, then, suddenly, none of the verbs have any effect. Links are flashing the verb, but nothing is coming of it. I hadn't changed anything.
Posts.HTML: The game was running perfectly and, then, suddenly, none of the verbs have any effect. Links are flashing the verb, but nothing is coming of it. I hadn't changed anything.

Posts.EditableText: Well, it is working just fine, again, but I no longer trust it.
Posts.HTML: Well, it is working just fine, again, but I no longer trust it.
